text: Hugo de Souza Nogueira (born 31 January 1999), known as Hugo Souza or simply Neneca, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Flamengo as a goalkeeper. ==Club career== Hugo, born in the city of Duque de Caxias, joined the Flamengo youth academy in 2009 at the age of ten. With the youth squad he won two Copa São Paulo de Futebol Júnior (2016 and 2018). ===Flamengo=== On 27 September 2020 Hugo made his professional debut in a 1–1 draw between Flamengo against Palmeiras, Hugo was selected as Man of the Match. ==International career== On 17 August 2018 Brazilian national team manager Tite included Hugo on the 23-man roster for a pair of friendlies against the United States and El Salvador but he did not feature in either match. On 13 December 2018 Hugo was called up to the 2019 South American U-20 Championship squad for Brazil but did not play. ==Honours== ;Flamengo *Campeonato Brasileiro Série A: 2019 *Supercopa do Brasil: 2020 *Campeonato Carioca: 2019, 2020 ==References== ==External links== *Flamengo official profile * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rio de Janeiro (state) Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Clube de Regatas do Flamengo footballers Category:Brazil under-20 international footballers
title: Hugo Souza
